computedFields.name: ActualEndDate
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when coalesce('SalesAgreementProduct.SalesAgreement.CancellationDate_sec_epoch',0) > 0 and toDate('SalesAgreementProduct.SalesAgreement.CancellationDate_sec_epoch') < toDate('EndDate_sec_epoch') then toDate('SalesAgreementProduct.SalesAgreement.CancellationDate_sec_epoch') else toDate('EndDate_sec_epoch') end
computedFields.label: Actual End Date

computedFields.name: isValidProductSchedule
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'SalesAgreementProduct.SalesAgreement.Status' == "Cancelled" && 'SalesAgreementProduct.SalesAgreement.CancellationDate_sec_epoch' is not null && toDate('SalesAgreementProduct.SalesAgreement.CancellationDate_sec_epoch') < toDate('StartDate_sec_epoch') then "false" else "true" end
computedFields.label: Valid Product Schedule

computedFields.name: Schedule_Derived_Status
computedFields.saqlExpression:
case 
when 'SalesAgreementProduct.SalesAgreement.StatusCode' in ["Expired"] then "Expired"
when 'SalesAgreementProduct.SalesAgreement.StatusCode' in ["Cancelled"] && ( (coalesce('StartDate_sec_epoch',0)<coalesce('SalesAgreementProduct.SalesAgreement.CancellationDate_sec_epoch',0) && coalesce('EndDate_sec_epoch',0)>coalesce('SalesAgreementProduct.SalesAgreement.CancellationDate_sec_epoch',0)) || coalesce('StartDate_sec_epoch',0)>coalesce('SalesAgreementProduct.SalesAgreement.CancellationDate_sec_epoch',0) )  then "Cancelled"
when 'SalesAgreementProduct.SalesAgreement.StatusCode' in ["Cancelled"] && (coalesce('StartDate_sec_epoch',0)<coalesce('SalesAgreementProduct.SalesAgreement.CancellationDate_sec_epoch',0) && coalesce('EndDate_sec_epoch',0)<=coalesce('SalesAgreementProduct.SalesAgreement.CancellationDate_sec_epoch',0))  then "Expired"
when 'SalesAgreementProduct.SalesAgreement.StatusCode' in ["Activated"] && (coalesce('StartDate_sec_epoch',0)>date_to_epoch(now())) then "Upcoming"
when 'SalesAgreementProduct.SalesAgreement.StatusCode' in ["Activated"] && (coalesce('StartDate_sec_epoch',0)<=date_to_epoch(now()) && coalesce('EndDate_sec_epoch',0)>date_to_epoch(now())) then "Active"
when 'SalesAgreementProduct.SalesAgreement.StatusCode' in ["Activated"] && coalesce('EndDate_sec_epoch',0)<date_to_epoch(now()) then "Expired"
end
computedFields.label: Schedule Derived Status

computedFields.name: Derived_Status
computedFields.saqlExpression:
case when 'Status' == "Activated" && date('EndDate_Year', 'EndDate_Month', 'EndDate_Day') in ["current day".."60 days ahead"] then "Upcoming Renewal"
when 'Status' == "Draft" then "Pending Approval"
else 'Status' end
computedFields.label: Derived Status

computedFields.name: PlannedDaysFinal
computedFields.saqlExpression:
case when toDate('ActualEndDate_sec_epoch') < toDate('StartDate_sec_epoch') then 0 else 
daysBetween(toDate('StartDate_sec_epoch'),toDate('ActualEndDate_sec_epoch'))+1 end
computedFields.label: Planned Days Final

computedFields.name: PlannedDailyAmount
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when isValidProductSchedule=="false" then 0 else DerivedPlannedAmount/PlannedDays_Total end
computedFields.label: Planned Daily Amount

computedFields.name: PlannedDailyQuantity
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when isValidProductSchedule=="false" then 0 else PlannedQuantity/PlannedDays_Total end
computedFields.label: Planned Daily Quantity

computedFields.name: ForecastedDailyAmount
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when isValidProductSchedule=="false" then 0 else ForecastedAmount/PlannedDays_Total end
computedFields.label: Forecasted Daily Amount

computedFields.name: ForecastedDailyQuantity
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when isValidProductSchedule=="false" then 0 else ForecastedQuantity/PlannedDays_Total end
computedFields.label: Forecasted Daily Quantity
